headline: Allegion (ALLE) Margins Rise, Premium Valuation Raises Questions Versus Market Growth Expectations
summary: Allegion (ALLE) posted earnings growth of 13% over the past year, outpacing its five-year annual average of 11%. Net profit margin rose to 16.2% from last year’s 15.1%, signaling further profitability gains. Looking ahead, earnings and revenue are forecast to grow at 8.9% and 6.8% per year respectively, both trailing US market averages, while shares trade at a price-to-earnings ratio of 23.5x, which is above peer and industry norms. This combination of stronger margins and a premium valuation...

headline: Allegion: Turning Out To Be A Real Secure Play
summary: Allegion shows strong growth from bolt-on M&A, robust sales, and raised earnings guidance with reasonable leverage. See why ALLE stock is a hold.

headline: ALLE Q3 Deep Dive: M&A and Electronics Growth Offset Residential Softness
summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 10.7% year on year to $1.07 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.30 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
